title: Order relative to procedures to be followed when considering the Senate Bill making appropriations for the fiscal year 2025 to provide for supplementing certain existing appropriations and for certain other activities and projects (Senate, No. 2529)

abstracts.abstract: Senate, June 12, 2025 -- Order (Senator Rodrigues) relative to procedures to be followed when considering the making appropriations for the fiscal year 2025 to provide for supplementing certain existing appropriations and for certain other activities and projects (Senate, No. 2529)
